highlights.title: The Journey Starts
highlights.description: Come to Melbourne for high-level education in Trinity Collecge, as a turning point of my life, and the biggest decision I've ever made.

highlights.title: University of Melbourne
highlights.description: Completed the course works at Trinity Collecge, and enough age, too. If I've been born few months earlier, probably I can get into Uni one sem earlier? But I do like the friends i met so nvmd hahaha.

highlights.title: Graduation Ceremony
highlights.description: Completed my study at the University of Melbourne, as a Student from Computing & Software Systems.

highlights.title: Barista
highlights.description: I love coffee, so I get my barista licence on that day. Now I'm a barista for myself XD.

highlights.title: Baptism
highlights.description: Baptism in to Christ as a Seventh-Day Adventist at Gateway City Church. Praise the Lord for His help during my spiritual journey.

highlights.title: Completion of this Site
highlights.description: Accomplishment of my personal website, including a snack map into a closed beta.
